content.html: I don't understand this trait of programmers where they have to insult tools they don't use instead of just saying "I prefer to use this instead". You don't have to tear down other people's work or preferences while stating your own. Be kinder.
content.value:
I don't understand this trait of programmers where they have to insult tools they don't use instead of just saying "I prefer to use this instead".

You don't have to tear down other people's work or preferences while stating your own. Be kinder.
